title: About Books: Richard Howorth on Square Books Bookstore
description:
Publishing industry news, insider interviews, and a look at current non-fiction books featured on C-SPAN's Book TV. In this episode we talked to Richard Howorth owner of Square Books bookstore in Oxford, Mississippi.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
